subject: Horse Racing
Preakness Stakes
Kentucky Derby
lead_paragraph: The owners of last year’s Derby winner, California Chrome, were upset with Churchill Downs after their experience here in 2014, so much so that two of them decided to skip the Preakness.
snippet: The owners of last year’s Derby winner, California Chrome, were upset with Churchill Downs after their experience here in 2014, so much so that two of them decided to skip the Preakness.
